paragraph: I am a Frontend Developer based in Helsinki, Finland. I have a passion for UI effects, animations and creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences. As a developer, I also aim to write clean, elegant and efficient code. Let's make something together.

Professionally I am connected with the web development industry and information technology for many years. My main area of expertise is frontend development (client-side of the web). However, I also have experience in building fullstack applications with Nodejs and Mongodb.

User experience is my first priority when designing applications. Interfaces must be intuitive, easy to use and visually appealing across various touch points. I value simple content structures, clean subtle designs, and thoughtful interactions.
